title: PM to address nation tonight: Marriyum
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 13 (APP): Minister for Information and Broadcasting Marriyum Aurangzeb said on Saturday that
Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif (today) will address the nation at 9:00 p.m tonight.
She made this announcement while using her twitter handle.
